metas.name: Street Outlaws: No Prep Kings
metas.description: Each week, Outlaws veteran "Chuck" will serve as race master in a new city and on a new "no prep" track, where 32 of the biggest names in no prep racing – including Street Outlaws favorites, as well as newcomers – will duke it out to become the ultimate "no prep winner" and receive a $40,000 first place purse. With more than $320,000 up for grabs across eight episodes, the stakes are high and the risks are even higher, as local crowds flock to each race to see which all-star Street Outlaws will show up, and who will win it all.

metas.name: George Poveromo's World of Saltwater Fishing
metas.description: George Poveromo targets the most popular saltwater game fish.

videos.title: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark: Miami, Florida

metas.name: Wardens of the North
metas.description: Follow Michigan Conservation Officers as they protect and patrol the most precious natural resources in one of the nation's most remote areas.

metas.name: The Beauty Queen and the Catfish
metas.description: When a small-town beauty queen suspects the doctor she has been messaging is not who he says he is, she turns detective to catch one of the UK's most prolific catfish.

videos.title: The Mystery Medic
videos.overview: When a mysterious doctor starts flirting with a former beauty queen online, she smells a love rat. But when she starts digging, the mystery deepens, and nothing is as it seems.

videos.title: Turning Detective
videos.overview: The women work together to reveal the true identity of their catfish. However, as more victims and evidence come to light, the women are forced to take matters into their own hands.

videos.title: Convicting the Catfish
videos.overview: With the perpetrator now investigated by the police as a serial offender, questions turn to what drove them to become one of the UK's prolific catfish - and why can't they stop?

metas.name: Love & Marriage: Huntsville
metas.description: Love & Marriage: Huntsville centers around the lives of three high-powered African-American couples who come together to help the thriving city of Huntsville, Alabama, continue to grow through their joint real estate venture, the Comeback Group. These couples are longtime friends and avid socialites with strong personalities and points of view. As they strive to make this huge undertaking a success, they face the realities of love and marriage. Will they succeed at mixing business with pleasure? Or will their personal quarrels make foes of these longtime friends?

videos.title: Respect Your Yell-ders
videos.overview: The gang busts moves at Tisha and Marsau's '80s-themed dance party. Wanda works the red carpet then gets into a shouting match with Nell. Tisha continues to throw jabs with Destiny. Kimmi and Maurice's date night ends with an unexpected twist.

metas.name: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
metas.description: Did you know that a brown bear became a war hero for the Allies during WWII? Or that a flying lawnmower once killed a spectator at a football game? What about the story of the 19th century doctor who ate vomit to understand how yellow fever is transmitted?If you haven't, then brace yourself for The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd.Each hour-long episode will open up our cabinet of curiosities to reveal the strangest-but-true stories in human history, brought to life through dynamic recreation, compelling graphics, and arresting archival. These seemingly tall tales all actually happened, and our cast of experts dives into the historical record to tell you how and why.It's a bizarro barrage of people, places and events that prove just how weird our world can be.

videos.title: Wildest Weapons
videos.overview: Weapons rank among humanity's most powerful—and wildest—inventions.

metas.name: Father Brown
metas.description: Drama based on the stories by G.K. Chesterton, about a crime-solving Roman Catholic priest.

videos.title: The Good Refuge
videos.overview: Mrs McCarthy makes a surprise return to Kembleford and joins Father Brown to investigate one more murder.

videos.title: The Hole in My Heart
videos.overview: Father Brown investigates when rock ‘n' roll sensations The Hart Brothers return home to Kembleford, bringing murder with them.

videos.title: The Palace by the Sea
videos.overview: Father Brown investigates beside the seaside when Sullivan's beloved Aunty Pat is arrested for murder.

videos.title: The Crackpot and the Dummy
videos.overview: Father Brown investigates when an old friend, eccentric ventriloquist Uncle Mirth, is arrested for murder.

videos.title: The Shadow of Lazarus
videos.overview: Father Brown and Flambeau play a deadly game of cat and mouse with their nemesis Father Lazarus.

videos.title: The Obedient Wife
videos.overview: Father Brown investigates when Violet Goodfellow is attacked by the killer of a senior policeman.

videos.title: The Bodhi Tree
videos.overview: Father Brown investigates when Lady Felicia's friend drops dead during a yoga session at a Buddhist retreat.

videos.title: The Oath of Silence
videos.overview: Father Brown is in a race against time to prove the innocence of a man standing trial for murder.

videos.title: The Power of Suggestion
videos.overview: Father Brown investigates when a Hollywood starlet is murdered while filming an advert for washing powder.

videos.title: The Bishop's Revenge
videos.overview: After taking revenge on Father Brown, bishop-elect Fox is kidnapped. Can the priest find him in time for his consecration?

metas.name: A Thousand Blows
metas.description: Hezekiah and Alec, two friends from Jamaica, find themselves thrust into the criminal underbelly of Victorian London's East End. Here they meet Mary Carr, Queen of an all-female criminal gang known as the Forty Elephants, and run afoul of Sugar Goodson, criminal kingpin and notorious boxer.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Hezekiah is a shadow of the man he once was, and Sugar Goodson drinks himself to death.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: London isn't done with Hezekiah. Mary makes her next move, and a battle looms.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: The battle unfolds with devastating consequences, and Mary reveals her newly arrived accomplice.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: The fight nights return. Sugar faces a difficult choice, and Sophie realises she needs Mary's help.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: Sugar confronts Treacle. Hezekiah's student faces his opponent, as Mary's life hangs in the balance.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: As Murtagh's grip tightens, things come to a head for Hezekiah, Sugar, and Mary.

metas.name: Machos Alfa
metas.description: Pedro, Luis, Raúl and Santi are four friends who feel a bit lost in the new world of empowered women, each trying to adjust in their own haphazard way.

videos.title: Al final hay que meterla
videos.overview: Pedro gets a postpartum diagnosis. Marimar sends Raúl to conversion therapy. Santi has an AI companion. Esther falls asleep during a driving lesson.

videos.title: Marca España
videos.overview: Raúl hides his procedure from Marimar. Santi considers adoption, and Pedro gets a dating profile. Luis and Esther clumsily teach their son about sex.

videos.title: Ecos de una herida
videos.overview: The guys get the keys to their man cave. Pedro loses focus during a hot date, and Santi freaks out over test results. Raúl's parents drop a bombshell.

videos.title: Siempre se puede ser un poco más hetero
videos.overview: While the guys attend a brutal boot camp, the gals take a secret trip to Dubai. Eva digs into Santi's private life. Paz has a proposal for Luz.

videos.title: Rezaré por ti
videos.overview: The guys surprise Luis at his party, to Esther's dismay. Santi and Eva get closer. Raúl gets down to business with an old friend. Daniela gets jealous.

videos.title: Caribe mágico
videos.overview: During a luxurious group trip to Punta Cana, the couples face pretty big problems as secrets tumble out and family dramas reach breaking point.

metas.name: Fabrizio Corona: Io sono notizia
metas.description: This documentary series explores the life and career of paparazzi king Fabrizio Corona, reflecting Italy's recent history of scandals and social change.

videos.title: Alla corte del sultano
videos.overview: Italy, 2000s. As cultural tides begin to turn, socialite Fabrizio Corona enters the spotlight, rubbing shoulders with media moguls and models alike.

videos.title: Il re dei paparazzi
videos.overview: Fabrizio Corona capitalizes on his romance with model Nina Morić and starts his photo agency after playing all sides of Francesco Totti's love triangle.

videos.title: Tra fiction e realtà
videos.overview: From funeral coverage to felony charges, Corona still finds bold ways to build on his brand and deliver the juiciest scoop — even from behind bars.

videos.title: La giustizia non perdona
videos.overview: Corona targets Lapo Elkann and gets tough news amid new love with Belén Rodríguez, forcing him to face the reality of his actions or make an escape plan.

videos.title: Il signore dei soldi
videos.overview: After life in jail and ruined relationships, it seems all the cards are stacked against Corona. Can the king hold onto his crown in the modern era?

metas.name: The Last Drive-In with Joe Bob Briggs
metas.description: Proving once again that "the drive-in will never die," iconic horror host and exploitation movie aficionado Joe Bob Briggs is back with an all-new Shudder Original series, hosting weekly Friday night double features streaming live exclusively on Shudder. Every week, The Last Drive-In series offers an eclectic pairing of films, with selections ranging across five decades and running the gamut from horror classics to obscurities and foreign cult favorites. And from time to time, special surprise guests will drop in on Joe Bob and Darcy the Mail Girl.

videos.title: Don't Torture a Duckling
videos.overview: When a southern Italian town is rocked by a string of child murders, the police and two urban outcasts search for the culprit amid scapegoating within the superstitious community.

videos.title: Don't Go in the Woods
videos.overview: Four friends camping in the woods inadvertently stumble upon the domain of a maniacal killer.

metas.name: The First 48
metas.description: The First 48 follows detectives from around the country during these first critical hours as they race against time to find the suspect. Gritty and fast-paced, it takes viewers behind the scenes of real-life investigations with unprecedented access to crime scenes, autopsies, forensic processing, and interrogations.

videos.title: Betrayed
videos.overview: A woman is ambushed and shot dead on her doorstep, setting off a chain of events Tulsa detectives could never have predicted.

metas.name: Black Ops
metas.description: Black Ops is the story of Dom and Kay, who join the Met Police in the hope of cleaning up their community but are unwittingly thrust into the murky world of deep cover infiltration as they become part of a powerful criminal enterprise. But for Dom and Kay it quickly becomes more of a fiasco than Donnie Brasco…

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Dom and Kay start new roles at MI5, but each of them struggles to find their place. Dom takes a big gamble to impress a senior agent, sparking a dangerous chain of events.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Dom races to fix the situation before she's exposed, but Kay urges honesty. Things worsen when Dom is threatened by someone from her past, while Kay doubts if MI5's way of life is for him.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Dom ropes in Kay to help her gather evidence about Steve, and the pair trace him to a mysterious lock-up. Tevin piles on the pressure, and Kay gives Dom an ultimatum.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Dom and Kay try to ambush Steve by breaking into his flat, but plans go awry. Kay's loyalty is pushed to breaking point.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: After being dismissed from MI5, Dom and Kay go their separate ways – but will new clues about a possible threat to the Notting Hill Carnival pull them back together?

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Dom and Kay race to stop a looming threat at the Notting Hill Carnival, while a shocking twist reveals an unexpected enemy.

metas.name: His & Hers
metas.description: Set in the sweltering heat of Atlanta, Anna lives in haunting reclusion, fading away from her friends and career as a journalist. But when she overhears talk about a murder in Dahlonega — the sleepy north Georgia town where she grew up — Anna is snapped back to life, pouncing on the case and searching for answers. Detective Jack Harper is strangely suspicious of her involvement, chasing her into the crosshairs of his own investigation.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: TV newswoman Anna returns to her small Georgia hometown to report on a murder case, in which her estranged husband Jack is the lead investigator.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Jack and Priya try to poke holes in a key suspect's alibi. Anna returns to her alma mater for a contentious interview with an old classmate.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Anna jumps at a chance to return to the anchor desk. Zoe confronts Jack about what he's been hiding. Alice's decline forces some tough conversations.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Jack struggles to placate the locals at a fiery town hall. Priya's suspicions reach a breaking point. Anna is haunted by painful memories.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: Backed into a corner, Jack grows increasingly erratic. Anna finds herself on the opposite side of an interview. Richard's past comes to light.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: As the case comes to a close, Jack and Anna must reckon with the sins of the past — and the brutal consequences in the present.

metas.name: Girl Taken
metas.description: The story follows twin sisters Lily and Abby, whose lives are shattered when Lily is abducted from their quiet rural English town by beloved local teacher Rick Hansen. After years of abuse in captivity, Lily escapes – only to discover that freedom brings its own challenges. The world she longed to return to has moved on without her. As Abby, Lily and their mother Eve struggle to rebuild their family, they must confront the lasting damage and the terrifying reality that Rick is still out there, determined to control the narrative and evade justice.

videos.title: Snatched
videos.overview: Lily accepts a lift home, unaware of Rick's intentions.

videos.title: Trapped
videos.overview: Nearly a year later, Lily remains trapped and pregnant in Rick's dollhouse.

videos.title: Escape
videos.overview: Five years after her kidnapping, Lily escapes - but Rick denies everything.

videos.title: Showdown
videos.overview: Rick, in prison, offers to talk on one condition: he'll only speak to Lily.

videos.title: Crisis
videos.overview: Lily refuses to attend Rick's trial. Abby uncovers a shocking truth.

videos.title: Manhunt
videos.overview: With Rick on the run, a terrified Lily fears for her life.

metas.name: Meu Namorado Coreano
metas.description: Five Brazilian women, each at a different stage of life and love, travel to South Korea and meet their crushes in this K-drama-inspired reality show.

videos.title: Das tripas, coração
videos.overview: Some of the women party at karaoke and look for love on dating apps, as others take time to rebuild their relationships — and take them to a new level.

videos.title: Todas as expectativas do mundo
videos.overview: A letter written in Korean moves both a couple and a mother. While some sample the local cuisine, others take in an iconic view.

videos.title: Final feliz é coisa de K-drama
videos.overview: An encounter can shape the future of two lovebirds. As they return to Brazil, all participants reflect on their experiences and hopes for the future.

videos.title: React 2: Deu tudo certo!
videos.overview: Get ready for extra drama in this unique react episode, as celebrities and influencers judge and dish about how the series wraps up.

metas.name: K-foodie meets J-foodie
metas.description: Korea's top foodie Sung Si-kyung joins Japan's beloved Yutaka Matsushige on a tasty adventure as they explore culinary gems across Korea and Japan.

metas.name: Los Colorado
metas.description: The Colorado is back, and now he has a family. Along with his wife, children, and grandmother, he must save Chaotic City while dealing with chaos at home. From cavemen to intergalactic beings, no one will escape The Colorado..

videos.title: No Mar a Vida é Mais Gostosa...Até o Tubarão...
Um Conto Encantando de Chapolin Colorado
Procura-se a Mãe do bebê Jupiteriano
Mais Barriga que Juizo: A Saga dos Gordicholas
Não Há Clone Que Não Venha Para o Bem

metas.name: Digging for Britain
metas.description: The BBC Two series is presented by Professor Alice Roberts and archaeologist Matt Williams as they present the year's most outstanding archaeological excavations around the UK, linking together the results of digs and investigations the length and breadth of the country to build up a picture of the year in British archaeology.

videos.title: Scottish Massacre and 70s Skate Park
videos.overview: Featuring visceral evidence of a bloody massacre in the Scottish Highlands, one of the largest Roman cemeteries ever found in Britain, Bradford's first Muslim burial, more finds in Carlisle from a Roman bathhouse, and from the 1970s, Scotland's first skatepark.

videos.title: Our Rarest Find and Biggest Dig
videos.overview: Featuring two incredibly rare finds from an Iron Age hoard, a look inside the UK's largest and most complex dig in a generation, an Iron Age site perched on the very edge of the White Cliffs of Dover, and the earliest example of an artist's signature from Roman Britain.

videos.title: A Mysterious Bone Box and Admiral Nelson's Favourite Ship
videos.overview: Rare Anglo-Saxon swords, a mysterious and macabre Roman bone box and a cross-continental investigation into Admiral Nelson's favourite ship.

videos.title: England's Last Anglo-Saxon King and Scotland's First Whisky
videos.overview: The lost estate of Harold Godwinson, last Anglo-Saxon king of England, a completely intact 4,000-year-old cremation vessel and an unprecedented Roman whetstone factory.

videos.title: Medieval Murder and Roman Pets
videos.overview: Featuring a vast first-century Roman compound, the warhorses that changed the course of history, a medieval murder mystery, the thriving farmstead belonging to Isaac Newton's mother, thousands of animal bones from a Roman farm, and a 300-million-year-old forest that built the modern world.

videos.title: A Cornish Legend and an Ancient Wishing Well
videos.overview: Professor Alice Roberts returns to uncover fresh archaeological treasures and discoveries.

metas.name: Can You Keep a Secret?
metas.description: Widower Debbie Fendon - granny, lawn bowler, tinpot dictator - will stop at nothing to make sure her family's protected. Unfortunately, most of the time the person they really need protecting from is her. When her hermit-like husband William unexpectedly dies, she makes an outlandish decision that will put the family under more pressure than ever before.Because Debbie isn't actually a widower and William didn't really die – he was just mistakenly declared dead and the two retirees found themselves staring down the barrel of an opportunity too good to pass up. Just a few months hiding out in the loft waiting for the life insurance to pay out and then they can live out their golden years in peace.Set in the West Country, Can You Keep a Secret? is the story of an odd little family you haven't met yet, but that you already know.Can Debbie Fendon and her family keep their secret? Or will one of them spill the beans?

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Debbie has news: Harry's dad isn't actually dead, he's just hiding in the loft so they can swindle the cash from his life insurance. Will Harry join these two twits in their scam?

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Debbie bans William from chocolate and Harry from sharing their secret with Neha. But someone else now knows about William – and wants a cut of the cash. Who could it be?

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Neha and Debbie fight over whether to return the cash, while Harry and William are caught in the crossfire. But a blackmailer is still at large. Should the Fendons admit defeat?

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: While Harry and William babysit the kids, Neha helps Debbie hunt down the blackmailer. But given that they have so much dirt on the Fendons, will Neha be able to fight fire with fire?

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: Debbie makes a cunning plan to save the family. But what if even more people are out to get the Fendons? Meanwhile, William is out of meds – so he and Neha visit a drug dealer.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: As Debbie considers coming clean, the blackmailer decides enough is enough. But this endgame puts Harry and William in genuine danger – is it all over for the Fendons?

metas.name: Unlocked: A Jail Experiment
metas.description: At an Arkansas detention facility, a sheriff implements a radical social experiment to grant men who are incarcerated more agency in this reality series.

videos.title: Dangerous Politics
videos.overview: As a new experiment begins in an Arizona correctional facility, the inmates quickly learn what's at stake. How will they respond when the cell doors open?

videos.title: Pod Boss
videos.overview: The men face their first make-or-break moment when food goes missing at mealtime. A new arrival to the pod exacerbates fears of stealing.

videos.title: Chapo versus the world
videos.overview: After a fistfight, the entire pod faces serious consequences. Tensions flare when Chapo feels disrespected, but the numbers aren't on his side.

videos.title: Family connections
videos.overview: As the first week wraps up, an unpopular inmate makes amends. A surprise perk helps incarcerated parents like Woody and AO connect with their children.

videos.title: Dopesick
videos.overview: New arrivals spark a rise in drug use throughout the pod, putting the sober inmates on edge. Hondo faces a life-changing opportunity to move forward.

videos.title: On Probation
videos.overview: Halfway through the experiment, a major setback forces a new approach. KJ gets tragic family news. A conflict with a guard upsets the peace in the pod.

videos.title: Behind the Glass
videos.overview: After the sheriff gets an emergency call, the fate of the experiment hangs in the balance. A new incentive leads to emotional family reunions.

videos.title: The Final Day
videos.overview: The sheriff weighs his options: end the experiment or keep the cells unlocked? The men come together as a community to make their case for the future.

metas.name: Patience
metas.description: Patience Evans works in the criminal records department of Yorkshire Police, cataloguing and filing the evidence produced during major cases. A young autistic woman, she craves routine and order, relishing the solitude and structure her job provides but she yearns for more. A brilliant, self-taught criminologist, Patience has an instinctive eye for crime scenes and a passion for problem-solving.

videos.title: Vampire
videos.overview: The crime drama returns. When a man is found dead with a stake through his heart, Patience and new DI Frankie Monroe seek a logical answer to the vampire-like mystery.

videos.title: Music in the Minster
videos.overview: A music student is found dead... and then her professor dies too. Patience races to unravel the mystery, leading to a showdown in York Minster.

videos.title: The Magpie
videos.overview: A lawyer is shot dead in a packed boardroom - yet no one saw the killer. Is a dead magpie at the scene of the crime a clue for Patience?

videos.title: The Timetable
videos.overview: A young autistic girl witnesses her father's murder but is unable to tell anyone what happened. Can Patience gain her trust and uncover the truth?

videos.title: The Runes
videos.overview: When a Viking expert drops dead just before a big speech, Patience finds a message that hints at foul play... and then his colleague dies too. And Patience's romance with Elliot hits the rocks.

videos.title: Paco's Revenge
videos.overview: Resentment boils over between Patience and Frankie as they investigate the death of a botanist. And Jake takes Patience speed-dating.

videos.title: A Monk's Tale
videos.overview: When a monk is found dead in a chapel, unholy secrets surface at the monastery. Meanwhile, Patience finds herself under the spotlight, and starts to rethink her decision about Elliot.

videos.title: Hostage
videos.overview: Patience and Frankie are held at gunpoint by an escaped prisoner, and a figure from Frankie's past resurfaces. Patience comes to a realisation about her feelings, and a visitor brings unexpected news.

metas.name: The Cult Behind the Killer: The Andrea Yates Story
metas.description: When Andrea Yates drowned her five children in the family bathtub one June morning in 2001, the world was left shocked – what could make a young mother do something like that to her own children? In the wake of her confession, it was established Yates was suffering from postpartum depression and psychosis. But while understanding of her mental illness helped illuminate Andrea's struggle prior to the incident, now 25 years later, ID unravels the deeply tangled layers in which a cult can influence vulnerable individuals through manipulation and control by offering unprecedented insight into Michael Woroniecki, a rogue street preacher turned cult leader, and his connection to Andrea Yates.

videos.title: Indoctrination
videos.overview: After Andrea Yates' horrifying act, her dark preoccupation emerges a secretive cult, twisted teachings, and followers drawn into a growing web of control.

videos.title: The Horror Within
videos.overview: Woroniecki seemingly traps his followers in an isolation cocoon. His teachings appear to twist salvation into submission until Andrea Yates commits a horrific act that stuns a nation.

videos.title: Revelation
videos.overview: Andrea Yates faces two trials in the aftermath of the drownings, exposing the preacher's lingering influence. As Woroniecki deflects blame onto Rusty, a juror quietly reveals that his teachings shaped the verdict, raising questions of accountability.

metas.name: American Experience
metas.description: American Experience is TV's most-watched history series and brings to life incredible characters and compelling stories from our past that inform our understanding of the world today. Acclaimed by viewers and critics alike, American Experience documentaries have been honored with every major broadcast award, including 30 Emmy Awards, 4 duPont-Columbia Awards, and 18 George Foster Peabody Awards.

videos.title: Bombshell
videos.overview: On August 6, 1945, a revolutionary new weapon destroyed Hiroshima, a Japanese city of 300,000 inhabitants. Three days later, a second atomic bomb was dropped on Nagasaki. America's secret super-weapon was lauded for bringing about victory in the Pacific and ending World War II. President Truman's official announcement included half-truths that  shaped the government's official narrative: "Sixteen hours ago, an American airplane dropped one bomb on Hiroshima, an important Japanese army base." In fact, the bomb was aimed at Hiroshima's city center for maximum psychological effect; the army base on its outskirts escaped much damage.Eighty years after the devastating atomic bombings that ushered in the nuclear age, Bombshell explores how the U.S. government manipulated the narrative about the impact of the atomic bombings of the Japanese cities Hiroshima and Nagasaki. Through propaganda, censorship, and the co-opting of the press, the government presented a benevolent picture of atomic power, minimizing the horrific human toll. Bombshell sheds light on the efforts of a group of intrepid reporters to let the world know the truth.

metas.name: Waterloo Road
metas.description: Contemporary drama series set in a challenging comprehensive school.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Chaos reigns when Darius welcomes excluded students to the school, and he has to firefight to keep his second chances scheme alive. Agnes has a surprising connection with one of the newcomers that leaves her fearing her happy life is about to be destroyed. Meanwhile, Portia strives to build her beauty empire but is left sidelined when the spotlight falls elsewhere, while Donte clashes with Izzy over her attitude.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Portia is left mortified by a new romance turning sour but finds an unexpected ally in a rebellious supply teacher, Steph Haydock, who schools Ben on the error of his ways when STIs spread amongst the students. However, their unconventional methods attract the ire of Stella and threaten their careers. Elsewhere, Cat has second thoughts on her budding relationship with mean girl Izzy when the claws come out, while Stace is rocked by a revelation from social services.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Donte falls victim to Izzy's rage as she struggles to keep her emotions in check, whilst Nicky returns to take on a new challenge as behavioural lead. Can she make a breakthrough with a troublesome Leoni? Agnes is at odds when Schuey encourages her to confront the past head-on, but is Leoni really as guilty as Agnes claims she is? Elsewhere, Darius's latest money-making scheme causes chaos when he brings a sniffer dog into school. How much longer can he run away from his debt problems?

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Shola notices an unexpected change in Portia and suspects she has a new crush. Meanwhile, a surprise inspection sees Darius bend the rules to keep ahead of the inspectors. As Stace struggles with the demands of motherhood, Noel does his best to prove his dedication and put a smile back on her face. Lovesick Freddie gushes over his new online boyfriend, but are they really who they say they are?

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: Nicky's instincts are telling her that something is wrong with Tony, but can she figure out what's really going on and help Portia? Agnes spirals as Schuey pushes her too far, and she seeks solace in a surprising and dangerous place. Whilst the kids kick off over the lack of heating, Darius uses the situation to throw Stella off his scent. Nisha lends a supportive ear to Stace, who is struggling with the reality of being a young mum.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: As Tonya struggles with the aftermath, Nicky struggles with her confidence, leading to disastrous results. Whilst Darius's desperation sees him take big steps to protect his secret, Agnes puts her relationship in jeopardy as she betrays Schuey's trust.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: With Stella away, Darius takes charge. But the return of a familiar face stirs old tensions. A shocking revelation forces Stella to see everything in a new light. Meanwhile, Cat tries to support Portia but ends up making things worse, and Donte turns to his peers as he struggles to handle a disruptive Forest. Elsewhere, new mum Coral returns from maternity leave and immediately locks horns with Steph Haydock – they're opposites in every way and neither one is backing down.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: It's the senior prom at Waterloo Road, and Darius is closer than ever to landing the top job. But as Nisha begins to see him in a new light, she grows uneasy about what he may have done to get there. Meanwhile, Freddie's surprise for Luca backfires, Ashton and Shola's plans are shaken by a familiar return, and Stace's big day descends into chaos when her bridesmaids choose the prom over her wedding.
